field.value:
There are some errors in http://www.castleproject.org/activerecord/gettingstarted/index.html that I found after using it the first time:
1. appconfig.xml should be
<activerecord>
<config> <add key="connection.driver_class" value="NHibernate.Driver.SqlClientDriver" /> <add key="hibernate.dialect" value="NHibernate.Dialect.MsSql2005Dialect" /> <add key="hibernate.connection.provider" value="NHibernate.Connection.DriverConnectionProvider" /> <add key="hibernate.connection.connection_string" value="SERVER=Petras\SQLExpress;DATABASE=castleactiverecord;uid=sa;pwd=arbuzas;async=true" /> </config>
</activerecord>
2. The User class definition should be:
[ActiveRecord("[User]")] public class User : ActiveRecordBase<User>
3. This would be better code for http://www.castleproject.org/activerecord/gettingstarted/initandtest.html:
try { ActiveRecordStarter.Initialize(source, typeof(Blog), typeof(Post), typeof(User)); } catch(ActiveRecordInitializationException) { }
